EmailTemplate.name: [DE Only] RE-CRAFTED Retail Redeem Notification (voucher used)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for taking part in RIMOWA RE-CRAFTED.â€‹
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
You have taking part in RIMOWA RE-CRAFTED by giving your pre-owned RIMOWA***MODEL*** a new lease of life.
Thank you for helping build a more sustainable world.
We wish all the best for your future journeys.
Looking forward for our next adventures.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
